permitHolder: MARY MCLEOD BETHUNE CHILD DEVELOPMENT CENTER INC

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Compliance Inspection of Open Violations - Reinspection Not Required

infractions.Violation Summary: Fire extinguishers observed not to be inspected or maintained at time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service facility observed not maintained or in disrepair Dry sweeping observed in areas occupied by children
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: On day of inspection a designated heat/air quality advisory day child care service failed to take measures to maintain children and occupant physical comfort and hydration to minimize potential for the occurrence of heat related illnesses
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish
At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient lighting and or failed to maintain adequate foot candles in areas used by children
Appropriate outdoor play area not provided or maintained at the time of inspection
Adequate lighting not provided in food prep area at time of inspection Foods observed not protected from contamination from light fixture/bulb damage at time of inspection
Walls and ceiling observed constructed of inappropriate materials Walls and ceilings not maintained at time of inspection
